verses.verse: Who <S%H4310><s%> has believed <S%H539><s%> our report? <S%H8052><s%> and to whom <S%H4310><s%> is the arm <S%H2220><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> revealed? <S%H1540><s%>

For he shall grow <S%H5927><s%> up before <S%H6440><s%> him as a tender <S%H3126><s%> plant, and as a root <S%H8328><s%> out of a dry <S%H6723><s%> ground: <S%H776><s%> he has no <S%H3808><s%> form <S%H8389><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> comeliness; <S%H1926><s%> and when we shall see <S%H7200><s%> him, there is no <S%H3808><s%> beauty <S%H4758><s%> that we should desire <S%H2530><s%> him.

He is despised <S%H959><s%> and rejected <S%H2310><s%> of men; <S%H376><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> of sorrows, <S%H4341><s%> and acquainted <S%H3045><s%> with grief: <S%H2483><s%> and we hid <S%H5641><s%> as it were our faces <S%H6440><s%> from him; he was despised, <S%H959><s%> and we esteemed <S%H2803><s%> him not.

Surely <S%H403><s%> he has borne <S%H5375><s%> our griefs, <S%H2483><s%> and carried <S%H5445><s%> our sorrows: <S%H4341><s%> yet we did esteem <S%H2803><s%> him stricken, <S%H5060><s%> smitten <S%H5221><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> and afflicted. <S%H6031><s%>

But he was wounded <S%H2490><s%> for our transgressions, <S%H6588><s%> he was bruised <S%H1792><s%> for our iniquities: <S%H5771><s%> the chastisement <S%H4148><s%> of our peace <S%H7965><s%> was on him; and with his stripes <S%H2250><s%> we are healed. <S%H7495><s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> we like sheep <S%H6629><s%> have gone <S%H8582><s%> astray; <S%H8582><s%> we have turned <S%H6437><s%> every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to his own way; <S%H1870><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has laid <S%H6293><s%> on him the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of us all. <S%H3605><s%>

He was oppressed, <S%H5065><s%> and he was afflicted, <S%H6031><s%> yet he opened <S%H6605><s%> not his mouth: <S%H6310><s%> he is brought <S%H2986><s%> as a lamb <S%H7716><s%> to the slaughter, <S%H2874><s%> and as a sheep <S%H7353><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> her shearers <S%H1494><s%> is dumb, <S%H481><s%> so he opens <S%H6605><s%> not his mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

He was taken <S%H3947><s%> from prison <S%H6115><s%> and from judgment: <S%H4941><s%> and who <S%H4310><s%> shall declare <S%H7878><s%> his generation? <S%H1755><s%> for he was cut <S%H1504><s%> off out of the land <S%H776><s%> of the living: <S%H2416><s%> for the transgression <S%H6588><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%> was he stricken. <S%H5061><s%>

And he made <S%H5414><s%> his grave <S%H6913><s%> with the wicked, <S%H7563><s%> and with the rich <S%H6223><s%> in his death; <S%H4194><s%> because <S%H5921><s%> he had done <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> violence, <S%H2555><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> was any deceit <S%H4820><s%> in his mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

Yet it pleased <S%H2654><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to bruise <S%H1792><s%> him; he has put him to grief: <S%H2470><s%> when <S%H518><s%> you shall make <S%H7760><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> an offering for sin, <S%H817><s%> he shall see <S%H7200><s%> his seed, <S%H2233><s%> he shall prolong <S%H748><s%> his days, <S%H3117><s%> and the pleasure <S%H2656><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall prosper <S%H6743><s%> in his hand. <S%H3027><s%>

He shall see <S%H7200><s%> of the travail <S%H5999><s%> of his soul, <S%H5315><s%> and shall be satisfied: <S%H7646><s%> by his knowledge <S%H1847><s%> shall my righteous <S%H6662><s%> servant <S%H5650><s%> justify <S%H6663><s%> many; <S%H7227><s%> for he shall bear <S%H5445><s%> their iniquities. <S%H5771><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> will I divide <S%H2505><s%> him a portion <S%H2506><s%> with the great, <S%H7227><s%> and he shall divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> with the strong; <S%H6099><s%> because <S%H8478><s%> <S%H834><s%> he has poured <S%H6168><s%> out his soul <S%H5315><s%> to death: <S%H4194><s%> and he was numbered <S%H4487><s%> with the transgressors; <S%H6586><s%> and he bore <S%H5375><s%> the sin <S%H2399><s%> of many, <S%H7227><s%> and made intercession <S%H6293><s%> for the transgressors. <S%H6586><s%>
